localize.title: Buzzing on Product Hunt
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Product Hunt in your native language

nodes.excerpt: Hybiscus is a cloud based service for creating beautiful PDF reports using a selection of pre-designed components and a simple JSON API. Create professional looking PDF reports in a matter of minutes without any design skills. Just add content!
nodes.title: Hybiscus - Developer friendly JSON API for creating PDF reports.

nodes.excerpt: Create a new production-ready project with backend (Golang), frontend (JavaScript, TypeScript) and deploy automation (Ansible, Docker) by running one CLI command. Focus on writing code and thinking of business-logic! The CLI will take care of the rest.

nodes.title: Glass - Everything post-sales for consumer goods.

nodes.excerpt: Neat streamlines notification management for GitHub. It empowers high-performing teams to review, merge, and ship code with ease. Users can preview, triage, and jump to notifications without having to leave their screen. Available for free on macOS.

nodes.excerpt: Creating a mesh gradient in Figma has never been this easy. Set your mesh, pick some colors, and start creating some curvy gradients in a breeze! Or if you feel more like it, use any of the Collection gradients to bootstrap your new creation!
nodes.title: Mesh Gradients - Create awesome mesh gradients right in Figma

nodes.excerpt: Ever wondered how you should market your startup? Answer a few questions that get to the heart of your startups' offer, market and customers. Get sent a visual marketing funnel, with the channels/tactics that are working for startups like yours.
nodes.title: My Funnel - Generate a marketing funnel specifically for your startup.

nodes.excerpt: Truffle takes your past Slack conversations and uses them to help answer questions. Just ask a question in a Slack channel, and Truffle will automatically search its knowledge base for relevant content. Save your team time, just ask Truffle!
